title: ice: transmute_generic_consts: `Size::bits ... bytes in bits doesn't fit in u64`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![feature(transmute_generic_consts)] fn overflow(v: [[[u32; 8888888]; 9999999]; 777777777]) -> [[[u32; 9999999]; 777777777]; 239] { unsafe { std::mem::transmute(v) } } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.72.0-nightly (43062c43d 2023-06-09) binary: rustc commit-hash: 43062c43d2a63cf4e261c6eddc417575c4f3062f commit-date: 2023-06-09 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.72.0-nightly LLVM version: 16.0.5 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace
